summary: This is a brief internal email regarding the transfer of prisoners from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to GEO Group facilities, scheduled for August 9, 2019. It includes a request to include 7 days of medication with the medical summary for the transfer.

events.title: Scheduled Prisoner Transfer
events.description: Transfer of prisoners from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to GEO Group facilities is scheduled to occur.

keyFacts: A prisoner transfer from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to GEO Group facilities was scheduled for August 9, 2019.
The email instructs the inclusion of 7 days of medication with the medical summary for the transfer.
The document is dated August 8, 2019, and appears to be internal administrative correspondence regarding inmate logistics.
